content:
I've changed ResearchSubject.individual to ResearchSubject.subject and I've changed the search parameter.
I now get the following error ERROR @ compartment.patient.ResearchSubject.individual: Search Parameter 'individual' not found (src = ResourceValidator) which I can see in http://build.fhir.org/compartmentdefinition-patient.html but I can't work out how to change this. What's the magic?
